overview: As the sea waves crash on the beach, a group of women enjoy themselves while building a ship together and playing with dolphins. Meanwhile, above them, on the balcony of a nearby house, a sad girl sits on a cactus. The merriment below and the pastel coloured sea remind her of the freedom she is probably going to lose soon.

production_companies.name: Moholy-Nagy University of Art and Design

title: Sirens
